thread.title: Financial Analyst - Consumer Products at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (Denver, CO)
thread.title_full: Financial Analyst - Consumer Products at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (Denver, CO)

title: Financial Analyst - Consumer Products at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (Denver, CO)
text: Classification: Financial Analyst Compensation: $55,000.00 to $65,000.00 per year My client is a very well known consumer goods firm seeking a financial analyst. This is an excellent opportunity to get your foot in the door to a position where you can make an immediate impact on business operations utilizing your financial background. This position will perform division level analysis on inventory levels, pricing, product mix analysis, and overall sales mix analysis of a wide variety of products. Candidates must have a BS in Finance, Business, or Accounting and 3+ years of progressive experience in an analyst role. Those with retail, sales, and distribution experience will be considered first. This company offers excellent benefits, a great office culture, and the ability to make an immediate impact. Please contact Chuck Bustos at 303-296-1010 for more information and email your resume to me directly at chuck.bustos@roberthalf.com for immediate consideration!
